Definition.WordDefinition: Bryan, OH (city, FIPS 9792) Location: 41.47023 N, 84.54800 W Population (1990): 8348 (3556 housing units) Area: 10.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 43506 Bryan, TX (city, FIPS 10912) Location: 30.66855 N, 96.36521 W Population (1990): 55002 (23007 housing units) Area: 84.6 sq km (land), 0.2 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 77801, 77802, 77803

Bryan n 1: United States lawyer and politician who advocated free silver and prosecuted John Scopes (1925) for teaching evolution in a Tennessee high school (1860-1925) [syn: {William Jennings Bryan}, {the Great Commoner}, {The Boy Orator of the Platte}] 2: a town of east central Texas
